name: The Fool
description: The Fool represents new beginnings, spontaneity, and the leap into the unknown. A fresh journey awaits.

name: The Magician
description: The Magician symbolizes manifestation, creativity, and the power to make things happen. Harness your inner power.

name: The High Priestess
description: The High Priestess signifies intuition, wisdom, and deep connection to the unconscious mind. Trust your inner voice.

name: The Empress
description: The Empress embodies fertility, nurturing, and the abundance of life. A time for growth and creativity.

name: The Emperor
description: The Emperor symbolizes authority, structure, and control. Step into your power and take charge.

name: The Hierophant
description: The Hierophant represents tradition, wisdom, and spiritual guidance. Seek knowledge from established sources.

name: The Lovers
description: The Lovers card speaks of relationships, harmony, and choices. Align your values with those you hold dear.

name: The Chariot
description: The Chariot signifies triumph through control, determination, and overcoming obstacles. Your willpower is your strength.

name: Strength
description: Strength is about inner courage, patience, and resilience. You have the power to face challenges with grace.

name: The Hermit
description: The Hermit invites you to find clarity through solitude and reflection. Seek the answers within.

name: Wheel of Fortune
description: The Wheel of Fortune symbolizes cycles of life, luck, and destiny. Embrace the inevitable changes.

name: Justice
description: Justice stands for fairness, truth, and balance. Your actions are aligned with the law of cause and effect.

name: The Hanged Man
description: The Hanged Man encourages surrender and seeing things from a new perspective. Embrace the pause.

name: Death
description: Death signifies transformation, the end of one phase, and the beginning of another. Embrace the rebirth.

name: Temperance
description: Temperance represents balance, moderation, and healing. It's time to blend your energies harmoniously.

name: The Devil
description: The Devil card speaks of temptation, materialism, and unhealthy attachments. Break free from the chains that bind you.

name: The Tower
description: The Tower represents sudden upheaval and chaos. Though difficult, this destruction makes way for renewal.

name: The Star
description: The Star is a beacon of hope, inspiration, and spiritual guidance. Keep faith that your dreams will come true.

name: The Moon
description: The Moon represents illusion, intuition, and the unseen. Trust your instincts, but be cautious of deceit.

name: The Sun
description: The Sun signifies success, vitality, and joy. A period of happiness and abundance is near.

name: Judgement
description: Judgement marks a time of self-reflection, rebirth, and awakening. It's time to answer the call.

name: The World
description: The World represents completion, fulfillment, and the achievement of a long-term goal. Celebrate your success.

name: Ace of Cups
description: The Ace of Cups signifies emotional fulfillment, love, and new beginnings in relationships.

name: Ace of Pentacles
description: The Ace of Pentacles represents new opportunities in material wealth, career, and security.

name: Ace of Swords
description: The Ace of Swords symbolizes clarity, truth, and mental breakthroughs. A new idea or perspective is born.

name: Ace of Wands
description: The Ace of Wands signifies inspiration, creativity, and the spark of new endeavors.

name: Two of Cups
description: The Two of Cups symbolizes partnerships, love, and mutual respect. A balanced relationship awaits.

name: Two of Pentacles
description: The Two of Pentacles represents balance, adaptability, and juggling priorities.

name: Two of Swords
description: The Two of Swords speaks of difficult choices and indecision. Trust your intuition to guide you.

name: Two of Wands
description: The Two of Wands symbolizes planning, progress, and the ambition to explore new horizons.

name: Three of Cups
description: The Three of Cups signifies celebration, friendship, and unity. Share joy with those you love.

name: Three of Pentacles
description: The Three of Pentacles represents teamwork, collaboration, and the successful completion of projects.

name: Three of Swords
description: The Three of Swords speaks of heartbreak, sorrow, and emotional pain. Healing is on the horizon.

name: Three of Wands
description: The Three of Wands symbolizes progress, foresight, and looking ahead to future opportunities.

name: Four of Cups
description: The Four of Cups speaks of contemplation, boredom, and reevaluation. Seek clarity and purpose.

name: Four of Pentacles
description: The Four of Pentacles represents stability, security, and the desire to hold onto material possessions.

name: Four of Swords
description: The Four of Swords symbolizes rest, recovery, and taking a break from life's stresses.

name: Four of Wands
description: The Four of Wands signifies celebration, harmony, and the completion of a significant milestone.

name: Five of Cups
description: The Five of Cups speaks of grief, regret, and focusing on what’s lost. Look for hope beyond the sorrow.

name: Five of Pentacles
description: The Five of Pentacles represents hardship, lack, and feeling left out. Help is available if you open your heart.

name: Five of Swords
description: The Five of Swords signifies conflict, competition, and the consequences of a battle won or lost.

name: Five of Wands
description: The Five of Wands speaks of challenges, competition, and striving for recognition. Embrace the struggle.

name: Six of Cups
description: The Six of Cups represents nostalgia, memories, and revisiting the past. Embrace the innocence of youth.

name: Six of Pentacles
description: The Six of Pentacles symbolizes generosity, balance, and fairness in giving and receiving.

name: Six of Swords
description: The Six of Swords represents transition, moving on, and seeking calmer waters after troubled times.

name: Six of Wands
description: The Six of Wands symbolizes victory, recognition, and public achievement. Celebrate your success.

name: Seven of Cups
description: The Seven of Cups speaks of choices, dreams, and illusions. Stay grounded when considering your options.

name: Seven of Pentacles
description: The Seven of Pentacles symbolizes patience, growth, and the rewards of hard work.

name: Seven of Swords
description: The Seven of Swords speaks of stealth, strategy, and secrecy. Be cautious of hidden motives.

name: Seven of Wands
description: The Seven of Wands symbolizes defense, courage, and standing your ground against opposition.

name: Eight of Cups
description: The Eight of Cups represents leaving something behind in pursuit of greater meaning and fulfillment.

name: Eight of Pentacles
description: The Eight of Pentacles signifies hard work, mastery, and the dedication to craft.

name: Eight of Swords
description: The Eight of Swords represents mental restrictions, fear, and self-imposed limitations. Break free from them.

name: Eight of Wands
description: The Eight of Wands speaks of speed, movement, and swift action. Things are moving quickly now.

name: Nine of Cups
description: The Nine of Cups signifies contentment, fulfillment, and the realization of your desires.

name: Nine of Pentacles
description: The Nine of Pentacles symbolizes luxury, self-sufficiency, and enjoying the fruits of your labor.

name: Nine of Swords
description: The Nine of Swords speaks of anxiety, stress, and sleepless nights. Let go of what’s haunting you.

name: Nine of Wands
description: The Nine of Wands signifies persistence, resilience, and the ability to keep going despite adversity.

name: Daughter of Cups
description: The Daughter of Cups represents emotional exploration, creativity, and a youthful, romantic spirit.

name: Daughter of Pentacles
description: The Daughter of Pentacles speaks of practicality, diligence, and a grounded approach to life’s challenges.

name: Daughter of Swords
description: The Daughter of Swords represents mental clarity, observation, and the thirst for knowledge.

name: Daughter of Wands
description: The Daughter of Wands symbolizes creativity, passion, and an adventurous, spirited energy.

name: Father of Cups
description: The Father of Cups signifies emotional mastery, balance, and the ability to navigate complex feelings.

name: Father of Pentacles
description: The Father of Pentacles embodies stability, security, and the wise use of material resources.

name: Father of Swords
description: The Father of Swords represents clarity, logic, and intellectual strength. Use your mind to make decisions.

name: Father of Wands
description: The Father of Wands symbolizes leadership, creativity, and the drive to inspire others with your vision.

name: Mother of Cups
description: The Mother of Cups represents nurturing, compassion, and emotional intuition.

name: Mother of Pentacles
description: The Mother of Pentacles speaks of practicality, care for others, and the ability to create abundance.

name: Mother of Swords
description: The Mother of Swords embodies intellect, perception, and the power to discern truth.

name: Mother of Wands
description: The Mother of Wands represents nurturing creativity, independence, and the courage to take bold actions.

name: Son of Cups
description: The Son of Cups symbolizes emotional exploration, romanticism, and idealism.

name: Son of Pentacles
description: The Son of Pentacles speaks of diligence, responsibility, and commitment to long-term goals.

name: Son of Swords
description: The Son of Swords represents intellectual agility, communication, and swift action.

name: Son of Wands
description: The Son of Wands embodies creativity, enthusiasm, and the drive to achieve new heights.
